page.title: 13MR MILLS, MANOR FARM
page.content: Richard Mills in partnership with his father farms about{500}acres. Of that he owns 170 acres. Vernham manor, belonging to Mr Mills senior, is about 400 years old and until 1978 was owned by winchester college. He has 85 milking Friesian cows. He used to milk more than 100 cows but E.E.C. regulations have ruled that milk production must be cut. He keeps sheep to breed lambs for fattening. 300 pheasants are reared for private shooting. He is a full-time working farmer with 1 full-time cowman and 2 part-time workers. Some wheat is grown for thatching straw, all other cereal crops are combined. Grass is grown for grazing and silage.
